\newcommand{\sectionheader}[1] {
\vskip \medskipamount
\noindent\rule{0.2in}{0.4pt}{\Large \bf #1}\hrulefill
\vskip \medskipamount
}

\newenvironment{myitemize}
{ \begin{itemize}
    \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}
    \setlength{\parskip}{0pt}
    \setlength{\parsep}{0pt}
}
{ \end{itemize}
}
